<center>

### Exploring the drivers of migration in the Lower Mekong Region through the nightlights lens

<br>
<br>

The main goal of this project is  to provide tools to understand the impact of migration on development in the Lower Mekong Region using open data sources that help tackling social issues, through the exploration and estimation of information as a predictor of past (where data doesn't exist) and future changes.

 </center>
